name: SWORDY
description: Swordy is a local party brawler with chaotic physics-based action. Master the weapons of war, using momentum and timing to fight for your life in a world built on the bones of a ruined empire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
